meta.title: Letter from Warren Behrend to Mary and Ernst Behrend, 1929-12-19

sourceDesc.location: John M. Lilley Library, Penn State Behrend Archives

body.p: dance here next Saturday and if she has no definite * for next december Christmas and might be able to go I'll ask her if for that no that we can talk over that matter. I think Harriet would like it better if I could get someone to * & keep her company. I'll write you to New York the * * the phone call.
I'm not at all sure I'll have I'll have time to make the enlargements you want, but if I do I'll be glad to make them. Enlargements take a lot
